```
# ttyS0 - getty
#
# This service maintains a getty on ttyS0 from the point the system 
# is started until it is shut down again.

start on stopped rc RUNLEVEL=[12345]
stop on runlevel [!12345]

respawn
exec /sbin/getty -L 115200 ttyS0 vt102

```
